Message:
As I hurried into the grand hall,
the party had already started.
Sol should be here too, but...

I looked around, and saw how
beautiful the gifts everyone
was exchanging were.

Compared to all those gifts,
mine’s just...

Nrgh, I can’t stop
myself from worrying.
Will Sol even like my gift...?

“Hehehe.
Well, look at you, Big Sis.
You really are gorgeous!”

Sol’s smile melted away
some of the gloominess
I was feeling inside.

“Sol, here’s...
a present from me.
I hope you’ll accept it.

I mean, it’s totally fine
if you don’t want it though...”

With the brightest smile
on her face, Sol hugged
the present as tightly
as she could.
